channel.title: Does there exist an EXACT copy of Runescape in the years 2006 - 2009?
channel.description:
The topic says it all.
Thanks for answers :D

item.title: Does there exist an EXACT copy of Runescape in the years 2006 - 2009?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Ebbe:

Before you guys act like such jerks, please explain to me WHY this apparently is such a dumb question.

this is also a stupid question

it took years of development from a professional team of programmers for what you’re asking for to come into place on real rs and u honestly think a forum full of mainly 15-16 year olds can accomplish the same thing… lol

yes there are people within the scene that are capable of such things but its too much work, if you want old school rs with full content buy a membership like I did and play the actual game

the closest thing to a remake ive seen is runerebels and arios and both of those are closed source servers that are being hosted so ur out of luck sorry

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:10, topic:540728”][quote author=kepoly link=topic=659592.msg4410964#msg4410964 date=1393638669]

The topic says it all.

Thanks for answers

I still have all the old files from when used to fudge around on here.
Not free thoo
[/quote]
Can’t tell if stupid or sarcastic[/quote]
probably stupid

Read full topic

item.title: Does there exist an EXACT copy of Runescape in the years 2006 - 2009?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Ebbe, post:7, topic:540728”]Why are you guys acting soo childish? I didn’t know that this was soo self-explanatory, not after seeing the release of “Revival-RS 377 FULL REMAKE, NO BUGS, NO DUPES” Do you guys see that? “FULL REMAKE”? Full remake? Doese’nt that mean, a full remake of the 377 version? Well of course! What else can it mean? You tell me!
Before you guys act like such jerks, please explain to me WHY this apparently is such a dumb question.[/quote]

Do you honestly think anyone has the skill, time, and motivation to replicate an era of RuneScape completely lol?

Read full topic
